mdRecord.dcterms:title: University literary magazine
University of Virginia magazine
Virginia University magazine
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: University of Virginia.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Published by the students of the University of Virginia.

Error in numbering: Volume numbers in the caption titles for Dec. 1877-June 1878 incorrectly appear as Vol. 17 instead of Vol. 16; the error was continued through subsequent years, with the volume for 1878/1879 called Vol. 18, etc. on both the caption and cover titles.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: LH1 .V6 U8: Copy 2: Vol. 85, no.1-5 (1924/1925) transferred from Atcheson Hench letter to John Cook Wyllie, MSS 1577-b. Issues for Dec. 1892 and Apr./May 1893 inscribed by H. S. Cummings.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: LH1 .V6 U8: Copy 4: Vol. 12, no.1-9 (1873/1874): From the library of R.T.W. Duke, Jr. with annotations throughout in his hand.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: LH1 .V6 U8: Copy 5: Bound volumes, with most original covers bound in. Transferred from Alderman, 2020/2021. Most are labeled as Copy 2 on spine; 9 or labeled as Copy 4 on spine.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: F221 v.268 (v. 5 no. 7, April 1861), v.390 & v.526: In bound volumes with miscellaneous Virginia pamphlets.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: F229 .C28 Z92 .U55 V5: From the library of the Carter/Wellford family of Sabine Hall; signatures of A.L. Wellford and of B.R., or B. Rand, Wellford. Gift of Rev. T. Dabney Wellford.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: AB v.172 no.6: Virginia University Magazine, v. 6, no. 1, Dec. 1867, with "My class" written on front cover. In a bound volume of pamphlets given by Jennings C. Wise.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: LH1 .V6 U8: Copy 5: Bound volumes, with most original covers bound in. Transferred from Alderman, 2020/2021. Most are labeled as Copy 2 on spine; 9 or labeled as Copy 4 on spine.
